subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In today’s N.F.L., coaches looking to change their teams’ fortunes will not hesitate to change quarterbacks. It worked for Dallas with Tony Romo and now Denver is hoping for success with Jay Cutler.
snippet: In today’s N.F.L., coaches looking to change their teams’ fortunes will not hesitate to change quarterbacks. It worked for Dallas with Tony Romo and now Denver is hoping for success with Jay Cutler.
